body_html:
I have this problem with Centos 7.2. It is a pity as it is very close to working!
The corresponding compiler and software I used as below: bazel v0.5.2, gcc v4.8.5, python v2.7x, cuda v8.0, cudnn v6.0. The problem occurs when building the python package:

___[1,783 / 4,162] Compiling external/protobuf/src/google/protobuf/descriptor_database.cc
ERROR: /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/2608380002b7e82b3d07fef59e49e485/external/nccl_archive/BUILD:33:1: undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '@nccl_archive//:nccl':
this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'external/nccl_archive/src/libwrap.cu.cc':
'/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.8.5/include/limits.h'
'/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.8.5/include/syslimits.h'
'/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.8.5/include/stddef.h'
'/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.8.5/include/stdarg.h'.
In file included from /usr/local/cuda-8.0/bin/../targets/x86_64-linux/include/host_config.h:173:0,
from /usr/local/cuda-8.0/bin/../targets/x86_64-linux/include/cuda_runtime.h:78,
from :0:

body:
I have this problem  with Centos 7.2. It is a pity as it is very close to working!
The corresponding compiler and software I used as below: bazel v0.5.2, gcc v4.8.5, python v2.7x, cuda v8.0, cudnn v6.0. The problem occurs when building the python package:

___[1,783 / 4,162] Compiling external/protobuf/src/google/protobuf/descriptor_database.cc
ERROR: /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/2608380002b7e82b3d07fef59e49e485/external/nccl_archive/BUILD:33:1: undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '@nccl_archive//:nccl':
this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'external/nccl_archive/src/libwrap.cu.cc':
  '/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.8.5/include/limits.h'
  '/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.8.5/include/syslimits.h'
  '/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.8.5/include/stddef.h'
  '/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.8.5/include/stdarg.h'.
In file included from /usr/local/cuda-8.0/bin/../targets/x86_64-linux/include/host_config.h:173:0,
                 from /usr/local/cuda-8.0/bin/../targets/x86_64-linux/include/cuda_runtime.h:78,
                 from <command-line>:0:
